summary: Iteration 19 - Production Module Phase 1 Testing: All 10 features tested and PASSED. Backend API tests (22/22 passed) and Frontend UI tests all successful. Production Stages Dashboard displays 7-stage pipeline correctly, Machine Master with CRUD and filters working, Order Sheets page functional, Stage Detail Views working.
seed_data_creation: 3 test machines exist (COAT-01, SLIT-01, REW-01) created by main agent
context_for_next_testing_agent: Production Module Phase 1 is complete and working. All 7 stages (Coating, Slitting, Rewinding, Cutting, Packing, Ready to Deliver, Delivered) are functional. Machine Master has 5 machines with configurable wastage norms. Order Sheet creation from Sales Orders will be implemented in Phase 2.

1_production_dashboard.details: Dashboard loads with 'Production Control Center' title, 7-Stage Manufacturing Workflow subtitle, summary cards (Total SKUs, PCS in Process, SQM in Process, Overall Progress, Machines), Priority Overview, Production Pipeline with all 7 stages

2_summary_cards.details: All 5 summary cards displayed: Total SKUs (0), PCS in Process (0), SQM in Process (0), Overall Progress (0%), Machines (3)

3_stage_pipeline.details: All 7 stages visible with correct icons and descriptions: Coating (Base + Adhesive → Jumbo Roll), Slitting (Jumbo → Cut Rolls), Rewinding (Jumbo → Log Rolls), Cutting (Log → Cut Width), Packing (Cut Rolls → Packed), Ready to Deliver (Dispatch Ready), Delivered (Completed)

4_machine_master.details: Machine Master page loads with 5 machine cards displaying: machine name, code, type, location, capacity, wastage norm, status, and Edit button

5_machine_filters.details: Type filter works (Coating Machine shows 1 machine), Location filter works (BWD shows 3 machines)

6_add_machine_dialog.details: Add Machine dialog opens with all required fields: Machine Code, Machine Name, Machine Type (dropdown), Location (dropdown), Capacity, Capacity UOM, Wastage Norm (%), Notes

7_stage_detail_view.details: Stage dashboard loads with: stage icon and description, summary stats (Pending, In Progress, Completed, Wastage %), Production Quantities section (Target, Completed, Wastage, Hourly Avg), Work Orders table

8_order_sheets_list.details: Order Sheets page loads with table headers (Order Sheet #, Customer, Order Date, Items, Progress, Status, Actions), New Order Sheet button, empty state message

9_sidebar_navigation.details: Production group in sidebar has 4 items: Overview (/production), Work Orders (/production-stages), Machines (/production-stages/machines), Order Sheets (/production-stages/order-sheets). All navigation links work correctly.

10_api_dashboard.details: Returns correct JSON structure with: summary (total_sku, sku_in_process, total_pcs_in_process, total_sqm_in_process, overall_progress), order_sheets, work_orders, stages (all 7), priority, machines

test_classes: TestProductionDashboard - Dashboard API structure and auth
TestMachineMaster - CRUD operations, filters, duplicate code validation
TestStageDashboards - All 7 stage dashboards, invalid stage handling
TestWorkOrderStages - Work order stages list and filters
